fr.zelus.jarvis.core

Class RuntimePlatformRegistry

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.zelus.jarvis.core.RuntimePlatformRegistry

  • public class RuntimePlatformRegistry
extends Object
    A registry that stores RuntimePlatforms.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RuntimePlatformRegistry()
      Constructs a new instance of the registry and initializes its platformMap.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearRuntimePlatforms()
      Unregisters all the RuntimePlatforms from this registry.
      RuntimePlatform getRuntimePlatform(Platform platformDefinition)
      Returns the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformDefinition.
      RuntimePlatform getRuntimePlatform(String platformName)
      Returns the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformName.
      Collection<RuntimePlatform> getRuntimePlatforms()
      Returns all the RuntimePlatforms stored in this registry.
      void registerRuntimePlatform(RuntimePlatform platform)
      Registers the provided platform using its name.
      void unregisterRuntimePlatform(RuntimePlatform platform)
      Unregisters the provided platform.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RuntimePlatformRegistry

        public RuntimePlatformRegistry()
        Constructs a new instance of the registry and initializes its platformMap.

    • Method Detail

      • registerRuntimePlatform

        public void registerRuntimePlatform(RuntimePlatform platform)
        Registers the provided platform using its name.
        Parameters:
        platform - the RuntimePlatform to register

      • unregisterRuntimePlatform

        public void unregisterRuntimePlatform(RuntimePlatform platform)
        Unregisters the provided platform.
        Parameters:
        platform - the RuntimePlatform to unregister

      • clearRuntimePlatforms

        public void clearRuntimePlatforms()
        Unregisters all the RuntimePlatforms from this registry.

      • getRuntimePlatform

        public RuntimePlatform getRuntimePlatform(String platformName)
        Returns the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformName.

        RuntimePlatform are registered using the RuntimePlatform.getName() method.

        Parameters:
        platformName - the name of the RuntimePlatform to retrieve
        Returns:
        the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformName

      • getRuntimePlatform

        public RuntimePlatform getRuntimePlatform(Platform platformDefinition)
        Returns the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformDefinition.

        The provided Platform should follow jarvis' naming conventions, and provide a Platform.getName() method that returns the name of the concrete RuntimePlatform class to retrieve.

        Parameters:
        platformDefinition - the Platform representing the RuntimePlatform to retrieve
        Returns:
        the RuntimePlatform associated to the provided platformDefinition

      • getRuntimePlatforms

        public Collection<RuntimePlatform> getRuntimePlatforms()
        Returns all the RuntimePlatforms stored in this registry.
        Returns:
        all the RuntimePlatforms stored in this registry
